basics.name: Senior Warrant Officer Advisor
basics.label: Personnel Manager, Education Administrator
basics.summary: A dedicated and experienced Personnel Manager, Education Administrator, trained in Blackboard development, technical writing, Graduate level platform teaching, and flight instruction.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for course management documents, Programs of Instruction, Course Administrative Data, Individual Training Plans
highlights: Managed the complete redesign of the Aviation Warrant Officer Advanced Course
Developed a Blackboard interactive Aircrew Training Program
Developed aviation track-specific training for instructor pilots
Revamped the training strategy for the organization's overwater and crewmember qualification programs
Managed a special operations flight detachment in multiple regional commands throughout Afghanistan
